about_the_game:
It is the eve of Chinese New Year, and Cultists have emerged to cleanse the city of Hong Kong so that they will earn their salvation after what they believe will be the end of the world. Earn back your honor in the HKPD by sabotaging the cultist plot across six new missions set after the original Sleeping Dogs story.


Please note that there is no Russian language support available for this content. This DLC will not be loaded if the current language is set to Russian.
detailed_description:
It is the eve of Chinese New Year, and Cultists have emerged to cleanse the city of Hong Kong so that they will earn their salvation after what they believe will be the end of the world. Earn back your honor in the HKPD by sabotaging the cultist plot across six new missions set after the original Sleeping Dogs story.


Please note that there is no Russian language support available for this content. This DLC will not be loaded if the current language is set to Russian.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows Vista Service Pack 2, Windows 7
  • Processor:Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 or 11 compatible Nvidia or AMD ATI card, ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher
  • DirectX®:10
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor:Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 11 Nvidia or AMD ATI card, Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or ATI Radeon 6950
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

esrb.descriptors: Blood and Gore; Intense Violence; Sexual Content; Strong Language; Use of Drugs

nzoflc.descriptors: Violence, sexual themes and offensive language

oflc.descriptors: Strong violence, crime themes, coarse language and sexual references

pegi.descriptors: Extreme violence - Multiple, motiveless killing - Glamorisation of drugs - Strong language

short_description: It is the eve of Chinese New Year, and Cultists have emerged to cleanse the city of Hong Kong so that they will earn their salvation after what they believe will be the end of the world. Earn back your honor in the HKPD by sabotaging the cultist plot across six new missions set after the original Sleeping Dogs story.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish
*languages with full audio support
